description:
Warmth for cool rides. The built-in chamois and soft thermal fleece keeps you warm and comfortable during shoulder-season rides. Zipperless legs increase durability and comfort.

  • Thermal Fleece is warm, breathable and wicks away excess moisture
  • Select Escape 1:1® Chamois for maximum comfort
  • Silicone grippers keep hems in place
  • BioViz® reflective elements for low light visibility
name: Pearl Izumi Sugar Thermal Cycling Tights
